resources.string:
HELP

Museum Memes (Mume) is an app to make memes using images from the Rijksmuseum collection. Start your search from the searchbar, then select the image you would like to edit. Once the image is selected you can press the 'meme it'-button to start editing.

On the opening screen of the app you can also view the latest memes from the official 'Classical Art Memes' Facebook page. Please make sure you are logged in to Facebook to see these images. You can log in by clicking the Facebook logo at the top of the screen.

For questions and suggestions please contact me at: museummemes@outlook.com.


APIs

This app was developed using the Rijksmuseum API, Facebook Graph API and the Adobe Creative Suite.


REPORTING BUGS

Want to report a bug? Please send me an email with a detailed description of the bug: museummemes@outlook.com


PRIVACY POLICY

No personal information will be collected nor used by this app. We do not give, share, sell, or transfer any personal information to a third party unless required by law. The Facebook login is only used to retrieve the Classical Art Memes photos.
The privacy policy may be updated. Please check this dialog regularly to ensure you are familiar with any changes.
If you have any concerns regarding your personal info or have any questions, please contact me at: museummemes@outlook.com


LEGAL

For any other legal concerns (i.e. copyright) please also contact me at: museummemes@outlook.com
